summary.en-US: Automatically adds a newly created tab to a group, if the previously focused tab was in a group.

description.en-US:
**Planned Features**

I am working on an action button for the tab bar that should be used in place of the standard "+" button. This button will add a new tab outside of any group, essentially bypassing this extension.

**Changelog**

_Version 1.2.2 (2025-07-23)_
- Fixed error with action not being defined

_Version 1.2.1 (2025-07-15)_
- Added command "newTabIgnoreGroup" with default keyboard shortcut "Ctrl+Alt+T"; it will create a new tab outside any group
